instrument_status.comment: Please could you check instrument as I am seeing varience across the lanes from Nr side LH corner as if peltier not sitting properly. Now on C148/216.
Line 14 blocked and vici needed cleaning. now priming correct volumes.
#14 on PE module not working properly.
Flowcell chiller, replaced with new ready to run.
Chiller operation checked and functioning correctly. Ready to run.
Please could you check the chiller as instrument giving fan failure error. Screenshot on desktop. Now on C17/108.
Run restarted. Lanes 1,2,5 have a cluster density above recommended levels which could have caused the RTA software to crash.
has come up with a 'signal extraction error' in middle of read2.
Failed to reboot after cadding 3GB switch to boot.ini file. Shut down SBS, restarted PC. Resumed run OK.
Run has errored out with Signal Exraction error. Production FC on board - errored out at C13.
possible footprint issue affecting left hand side of images. Please check. Production FC on-board in High Salt buffer.
Rear manifold replaced, checked fluidics all ok.
RTA shows spreadin pattern from back manifold on last 2 aruns. Slight liquid/moisture on top of flowcell.
Soleniod on lane 6 not working. Replaced and checked fluidics all working properly.
Constant stream of air bubbles from PR2 (position 5) whilst priming.Re seated reagent, and multi primed, but not able to clear bubbles. Could this be checked out please, ta bill
Laser engine replaced with new. Ready to run.
Instrument laser power below specification. Laser engine to be replaced.
Pointsource (classic) laser engine replaced with like. Laser power tested. This instrument is ready to run on SCS2.3
Green laser output power below specification at beam launcher.
GA2x upgrade complete. NaOH wash required prior to next run.
Validation run passed with caveats - need to keep an eye on this one.
Changed my mind. Sample lanes poor, but sample is Okay - see run Il3_1429
Validation run passed (all but PhiX yield numbers)
Lowish cluster density, but passes validation criteria. Awaiting signoff acceptance.
Version f PEM installed. Tested for 36 cycle run. OK Requires NaOH wash before use
manual entry of last wash data from pnc 2008-02-28
